name: Law Abiding Losses 2 (EARLY ACCESS)
description:
A drifting game for the people.

Play as Jonah Drift-a-lot, a man who knows nothing but how to drift!

No seriously, if you asked him 2+2 he would call you a bit-

With over 10 cars (in early access, full version has over 50 cars) and "smart" A.I systems, this game is sure to leave you laughing!

Features:

-Bloody tire tracks when NPCs are run over!

-Special vehicles that modify the game!

-Time Attack mode! (doesn't actually work, still fixing that)

-No secrets.

Enjoy drifting and have a very safe day!

For those who want to play on mobile, a Android dedicated version is in the works, but will only come out with the full version.

I would recommend if you can, plugging a USB (or Bluetooth) keyboard into your phone. That way you can use the controls on screen without worrying.

Otherwise, I'm sorry man, you'll just have to wait.

Anyway... 

Enjoy the game in its broken early access beta!
